      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-iadl.focus">
      <path value="Composition.section.focus"/>
      <short value="當小節與composition描述的對象無關時，此小節是關於誰/什麼。"/>
      <definition
                  value="當小節的實際焦點不是composition描述的對象，而是代表與對象相關的某事物或某人時，例如：（對於病人對象）配偶、父母、胎兒或捐贈者。如果沒有指定焦點，則假定焦點為父小節的焦點，或者對於Composition本身中的小節，為Composition的對象。具有焦點的小節只 **必須（SHALL）** 包含對象（病人、對象、焦點等）與小節焦點相匹配的resources，或者是沒有對象的resources（少數resources）。"/>
      <comment
               value="通常，文件中的小節是關於該文件的描述對象，無論是病人、一群病人、位置、設備或其他。對於某些種類的文件，有些小節實際上包含有關的實體資料。典型的例子包括新生兒出院病摘中關於母親的小節，或者家族病史文件中關於每個家庭成員的小節，當然還有很多其他例子。"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.focus"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="Reference"/>
        <targetProfile
                       value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Resource"/>
      </type>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="cda"/>
        <map
             value=".subject? (CDA did not differentiate between subject and focus)"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-iadl.text">
      <path value="Composition.section.text"/>
      <short value="將文件中特定小節的內容簡化成容易理解的文字形式，便於人類閱讀和解釋。"/>
      <definition
                  value="一個供人閱讀的敘述，包含小節的核實內容，用以展現resource的內容供人類閱讀。這段敘述不需要涵蓋所有結構化的資料，但必須包含足夠的細節，確保僅透過閱讀這段敘述的人能夠在臨床上獲得安全且準確的資訊。"/>
      <comment value="文件Profile可能會定義應在敘述中呈現哪些內容，以確保臨床安全。"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.text"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="Narrative"/>
      </type>
      <condition value="cmp-1"/>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <mustSupport value="true"/>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value=".text"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="cda"/>
        <map value=".text"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-iadl.mode">
      <path value="Composition.section.mode"/>
      <short value="適用於此小節的處理模式"/>
      <definition
                  value="條目清單是如何準備的 - 它是一個適合持續維護的工作清單，還是代表從另一個來源截取的項目清單的快照，或者是一個準備好的清單，在該清單中，項目可能被標記為已添加、修改或刪除。"/>
      <comment
               value="這個資料項目被標記為修飾用，是因為不應將變更清單(a change list)誤解為完整清單(a complete list)。"/>
      <requirements value="小節有多種使用方式，因此必須清楚地了解如何安全地使用其中的條目。"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.mode"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="code"/>
      </type>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <binding>
        <extension
                   url="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/elementdefinition-bindingName">
          <valueString value="SectionMode"/>
        </extension>
        <strength value="required"/>
        <description value="應填入所綁定值集中的其中一個代碼。"/>
        <valueSet value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/list-mode|4.0.1"/>
      </binding>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="w5"/>
        <map value="FiveWs.class"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map
             value=".outBoundRelationship[typeCode=COMP].target[classCode=OBS&quot;].value"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="cda"/>
        <map value="n/a"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-iadl.orderedBy">
      <path value="Composition.section.orderedBy"/>
      <short value="小節條目的順序"/>
      <definition value="指定應用於小節條目的項目順序"/>
      <comment
               value="應用程式 **建議應該(SHOULD)** 按照給定的順序來顯示有序清單，但也可以允許用戶按照他們自己的偏好進行重新排序。如果沒有明確指定順序，則該順序是不確定的，雖然清單可能仍有某種排列順序。"/>
      <requirements value="這對於展示和呈現是重要的，清單可能會進行排序，以便將重要的資訊放在前面，或將相關的條目分組。"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.orderedBy"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="CodeableConcept"/>
        <profile
                 value="https://twcore.mohw.gov.tw/ig/twcore/StructureDefinition/CodeableConcept-tw"/>
      </type>
      <condition value="ele-1"/>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <binding>
        <extension
                   url="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/elementdefinition-bindingName">
          <valueString value="SectionEntryOrder"/>
        </extension>
        <strength value="preferred"/>
        <description
                     value="鼓勵使用所綁定值集中的代碼，但不強制一定要使用此值集，你也可使用其他值集的代碼或單純以文字表示。"/>
        <valueSet value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/list-order"/>
      </binding>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="n/a"/>
      </mapping>

    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-iadl.entry">
      <path value="Composition.section.entry"/>
      <short value="IADL 失能項目評估"/>
      <definition value="指向那些提供小節中敘述內容的實際resource的參照"/>
      <comment value="如果清單中沒有條目，則 **建議應該(SHOULD)** 提供 emptyReason。"/>
      <min value="1"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.entry"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="*"/>
      </base>

                       value="http://ltc-ig.fhir.tw/StructureDefinition/LTCQuestionnaireResponseReferralIADL"/>
      </type>
      <condition value="cmp-2"/>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>

      <isSummary value="false"/>

      </mapping>

        <map value=".entry"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-iadl.emptyReason">
      <path value="Composition.section.emptyReason"/>
      <short value="為什麼此小節是空的原因"/>
      <definition value="如果小節為空，則說明清單為空的原因。一個空的小節通常有一些文字說明空的原因。"/>
      <comment
               value="當一個小節是空的，其空白的原因對於理解該小節非常重要。需要注意的是，這個代碼是用於當整個小節的內容都沒有被包括時，它並不適用於個別項目被省略的情形，若為個別項目被省略的情況，開發者可以考慮在該條目中添加文字說明或標記。"/>
      <requirements value="允許捕捉像是「不存在」或「未詢問」這樣的情況，這對於大多數清單來說可能很重要。"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.emptyReason"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="CodeableConcept"/>
        <profile
                 value="https://twcore.mohw.gov.tw/ig/twcore/StructureDefinition/CodeableConcept-tw"/>
      </type>
      <condition value="ele-1"/>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <binding>
        <extension
                   url="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/elementdefinition-bindingName">
          <valueString value="SectionEmptyReason"/>
        </extension>
        <strength value="preferred"/>
        <description
                     value="鼓勵使用所綁定值集中的代碼，但不強制一定要使用此值集，你也可使用其他值集的代碼或單純以文字表示。"/>
        <valueSet value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/list-empty-reason"/>
      </binding>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="n/a"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="v2"/>
        <map value="CE/CNE/CWE"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="CD"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="orim"/>
        <map value="fhir:CodeableConcept rdfs:subClassOf dt:CD"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-iadl.section">
      <path value="Composition.section.section"/>
      <short value="嵌套的小節"/>
      <definition value="此小節中嵌套的小節"/>
      <comment value="嵌套小節主要是為了幫助讀者快速找到文件中的特定內容"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="*"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.section"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="*"/>
      </base>
      <contentReference
                        value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Composition#Composition.section"/>
      <condition value="cmp-1"/>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map
             value="./outboundRelationship[typeCode=&quot;COMP&quot; and isNormalActRelationship()]/target[moodCode=&quot;EVN&quot; and classCode=&quot;DOCSECT&quot; and isNormalAct]"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="cda"/>
        <map value=".component.section"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-sof">
      <path value="Composition.section"/>
      <sliceName value="questionnaire-sof"/>
      <short value="長者衰弱評估"/>
      <definition value="構成composition的各小節"/>
      <min value="1"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="*"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="BackboneElement"/>
      </type>
      <constraint>
        <key value="cmp-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human
               value="A section must contain at least one of text, entries, or sub-sections"/>
        <expression
                    value="text.exists() or entry.exists() or section.exists()"/>
        <xpath
               value="exists(f:text) or exists(f:entry) or exists(f:section)"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Composition"/>
      </constraint>
      <constraint>
        <key value="cmp-2"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="A section can only have an emptyReason if it is empty"/>
        <expression value="emptyReason.empty() or entry.empty()"/>
        <xpath value="not(exists(f:emptyReason) and exists(f:entry))"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Composition"/>
      </constraint>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <mustSupport value="true"/>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map
             value="./outboundRelationship[typeCode=&quot;COMP&quot; and isNormalActRelationship()]/target[moodCode=&quot;EVN&quot; and classCode=&quot;DOCSECT&quot; and isNormalAct]"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="cda"/>
        <map value=".component.structuredBody.component.section"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-sof.id">
      <path value="Composition.section.id"/>
      <representation value="xmlAttr"/>
      <short value="Unique id for inter-element referencing"/>
      <definition
                  value="Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces."/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Element.id"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>

                   url="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/structuredefinition-fhir-type">

        </extension>
        <code value="http://hl7.org/fhirpath/System.String"/>
      </type>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="n/a"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-sof.extension">
      <path value="Composition.section.extension"/>
      <short value="Additional content defined by implementations"/>
      <definition
                  value="May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension."/>
      <comment
               value="There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.  The use of extensions is what allows the FHIR specification to retain a core level of simplicity for everyone."/>
      <alias value="extensions"/>
      <alias value="user content"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="*"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Element.extension"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="*"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="Extension"/>
      </type>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ext-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="Must have either extensions or value[x], not both"/>
        <expression value="extension.exists() != value.exists()"/>
        <xpath
               value="exists(f:extension)!=exists(f:*[starts-with(local-name(.), &quot;value&quot;)])"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Extension"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="n/a"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-sof.modifierExtension">
      <path value="Composition.section.modifierExtension"/>
      <short value="Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized"/>
      <definition
                  value="May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element and that modifies the understanding of the element in which it is contained and/or the understanding of the containing element's descendants. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions.

Modifier extensions SHALL NOT change the meaning of any elements on Resource or DomainResource (including cannot change the meaning of modifierExtension itself)."/>
      <comment
               value="There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.  The use of extensions is what allows the FHIR specification to retain a core level of simplicity for everyone."/>
      <requirements
                    value="Modifier extensions allow for extensions that *cannot* be safely ignored to be clearly distinguished from the vast majority of extensions which can be safely ignored.  This promotes interoperability by eliminating the need for implementers to prohibit the presence of extensions. For further information, see the [definition of modifier extensions](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extensibility.html#modifierExtension)."/>
      <alias value="extensions"/>
      <alias value="user content"/>
      <alias value="modifiers"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="*"/>
      <base>
        <path value="BackboneElement.modifierExtension"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="*"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="Extension"/>
      </type>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ext-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="Must have either extensions or value[x], not both"/>
        <expression value="extension.exists() != value.exists()"/>
        <xpath
               value="exists(f:extension)!=exists(f:*[starts-with(local-name(.), &quot;value&quot;)])"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Extension"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="true"/>
      <isModifierReason
                        value="Modifier extensions are expected to modify the meaning or interpretation of the element that contains them"/>
      <isSummary value="true"/>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="N/A"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-sof.title">
      <path value="Composition.section.title"/>
      <short value="小節標籤(例如：目錄ToC)"/>
      <definition value="此特定小節的標籤。這將是文件呈現內容的一部分，通常用於建立目錄。"/>
      <comment
               value="標題為人類讀者指明小節。標題必須與作為 section.content 參照目標的resource的敘述一致。通常章節 **建議應該(SHOULD)** 有標題，但在某些文件中，這可能是不必要的或不適當的。通常情況下，當一個小節有其自己足夠區分的標題的子小節，或只有單一小節的文件時，就會這樣。大多數IG會要求小節標題是必填的資料項目。"/>
      <requirements value="不同類型的文件常常會有標準化的小節標題，這些標題為人們提供如何組織文件的指引。"/>
      <alias value="header"/>
      <alias value="label"/>
      <alias value="caption"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.title"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="string"/>
      </type>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="./title"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="cda"/>
        <map value=".title"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-sof.code">
      <path value="Composition.section.code"/>
      <short value="小節分類(建議)"/>
      <definition value="一個用於指明小節中所含內容種類的代碼，這個代碼必須與小節的標題相一致。"/>
      <comment
               value="Not all terminology uses fit this general pattern. In some cases, models should not use CodeableConcept and use Coding directly and provide their own structure for managing text, codings, translations and the relationship between elements and pre- and post-coordination."/>
      <requirements value="提供給文件中主題的標籤是標準化的，並且可以被電腦程式識別和處理。"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.code"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="CodeableConcept"/>
        <profile
                 value="https://twcore.mohw.gov.tw/ig/twcore/StructureDefinition/CodeableConcept-tw"/>
      </type>
      <condition value="ele-1"/>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <mustSupport value="true"/>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <binding>
        <strength value="extensible"/>
        <description value="應填入所綁定值集中適合的代碼，確定無適合的代碼才可以使用其他值集的代碼來表示。"/>
        <valueSet value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/doc-section-codes"/>
      </binding>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="n/a"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="v2"/>
        <map value="CE/CNE/CWE"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="CD"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="orim"/>
        <map value="fhir:CodeableConcept rdfs:subClassOf dt:CD"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-sof.author">
      <path value="Composition.section.author"/>
      <short value="誰和/或什麼人撰寫了該小節"/>
      <definition value="指明誰對小節中的資訊負責，而不一定是誰輸入了它。"/>
      <requirements value="指明誰對內容負責"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="*"/>

        <path value="Composition.section.author"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="*"/>
      </base>

        <code value="Reference"/>
        <targetProfile
                       value="https://twcore.mohw.gov.tw/ig/twcore/StructureDefinition/Practitioner-twcore"/>
        <targetProfile
                       value="https://twcore.mohw.gov.tw/ig/twcore/StructureDefinition/PractitionerRole-twcore"/>
        <targetProfile
                       value="https://twcore.mohw.gov.tw/ig/twcore/StructureDefinition/Organization-twcore"/>
        <targetProfile
                       value="https://twcore.mohw.gov.tw/ig/twcore/StructureDefinition/Patient-twcore"/>
        <targetProfile
                       value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Device"/>
        <targetProfile
                       value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RelatedPerson"/>
      </type>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>

      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-sof.focus">
      <path value="Composition.section.focus"/>
      <short value="當小節與composition描述的對象無關時，此小節是關於誰/什麼。"/>
      <definition
                  value="當小節的實際焦點不是composition描述的對象，而是代表與對象相關的某事物或某人時，例如：（對於病人對象）配偶、父母、胎兒或捐贈者。如果沒有指定焦點，則假定焦點為父小節的焦點，或者對於Composition本身中的小節，為Composition的對象。具有焦點的小節只 **必須（SHALL）** 包含對象（病人、對象、焦點等）與小節焦點相匹配的resources，或者是沒有對象的resources（少數resources）。"/>
      <comment
               value="通常，文件中的小節是關於該文件的描述對象，無論是病人、一群病人、位置、設備或其他。對於某些種類的文件，有些小節實際上包含有關的實體資料。典型的例子包括新生兒出院病摘中關於母親的小節，或者家族病史文件中關於每個家庭成員的小節，當然還有很多其他例子。"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.focus"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="Reference"/>
        <targetProfile
                       value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Resource"/>
      </type>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="cda"/>
        <map
             value=".subject? (CDA did not differentiate between subject and focus)"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-sof.text">
      <path value="Composition.section.text"/>
      <short value="將文件中特定小節的內容簡化成容易理解的文字形式，便於人類閱讀和解釋。"/>
      <definition
                  value="一個供人閱讀的敘述，包含小節的核實內容，用以展現resource的內容供人類閱讀。這段敘述不需要涵蓋所有結構化的資料，但必須包含足夠的細節，確保僅透過閱讀這段敘述的人能夠在臨床上獲得安全且準確的資訊。"/>
      <comment value="文件Profile可能會定義應在敘述中呈現哪些內容，以確保臨床安全。"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.text"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="Narrative"/>
      </type>
      <condition value="cmp-1"/>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <mustSupport value="true"/>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value=".text"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="cda"/>
        <map value=".text"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-sof.mode">
      <path value="Composition.section.mode"/>
      <short value="適用於此小節的處理模式"/>
      <definition
                  value="條目清單是如何準備的 - 它是一個適合持續維護的工作清單，還是代表從另一個來源截取的項目清單的快照，或者是一個準備好的清單，在該清單中，項目可能被標記為已添加、修改或刪除。"/>
      <comment
               value="這個資料項目被標記為修飾用，是因為不應將變更清單(a change list)誤解為完整清單(a complete list)。"/>
      <requirements value="小節有多種使用方式，因此必須清楚地了解如何安全地使用其中的條目。"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.mode"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="code"/>
      </type>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <binding>
        <extension
                   url="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/elementdefinition-bindingName">
          <valueString value="SectionMode"/>
        </extension>
        <strength value="required"/>
        <description value="應填入所綁定值集中的其中一個代碼。"/>
        <valueSet value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/list-mode|4.0.1"/>
      </binding>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="w5"/>
        <map value="FiveWs.class"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map
             value=".outBoundRelationship[typeCode=COMP].target[classCode=OBS&quot;].value"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="cda"/>
        <map value="n/a"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-sof.orderedBy">
      <path value="Composition.section.orderedBy"/>
      <short value="小節條目的順序"/>
      <definition value="指定應用於小節條目的項目順序"/>
      <comment
               value="應用程式 **建議應該(SHOULD)** 按照給定的順序來顯示有序清單，但也可以允許用戶按照他們自己的偏好進行重新排序。如果沒有明確指定順序，則該順序是不確定的，雖然清單可能仍有某種排列順序。"/>
      <requirements value="這對於展示和呈現是重要的，清單可能會進行排序，以便將重要的資訊放在前面，或將相關的條目分組。"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.orderedBy"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="CodeableConcept"/>
        <profile
                 value="https://twcore.mohw.gov.tw/ig/twcore/StructureDefinition/CodeableConcept-tw"/>
      </type>
      <condition value="ele-1"/>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <binding>
        <extension
                   url="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/elementdefinition-bindingName">
          <valueString value="SectionEntryOrder"/>
        </extension>
        <strength value="preferred"/>
        <description
                     value="鼓勵使用所綁定值集中的代碼，但不強制一定要使用此值集，你也可使用其他值集的代碼或單純以文字表示。"/>
        <valueSet value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/list-order"/>
      </binding>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="n/a"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="v2"/>
        <map value="CE/CNE/CWE"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="CD"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="orim"/>
        <map value="fhir:CodeableConcept rdfs:subClassOf dt:CD"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-sof.entry">
      <path value="Composition.section.entry"/>
      <short value="長者衰弱評估"/>
      <definition value="指向那些提供小節中敘述內容的實際resource的參照"/>
      <comment value="如果清單中沒有條目，則 **建議應該(SHOULD)** 提供 emptyReason。"/>
      <min value="1"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.entry"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="*"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="Reference"/>
        <targetProfile
                       value="http://ltc-ig.fhir.tw/StructureDefinition/LTCQuestionnaireResponseReferralSOF"/>
      </type>
      <condition value="cmp-2"/>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <mustSupport value="true"/>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map
             value=".outboundRelationship[typeCode=COMP] or  .participation[typeCode=SBJ]"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="cda"/>
        <map value=".entry"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-sof.emptyReason">
      <path value="Composition.section.emptyReason"/>
      <short value="為什麼此小節是空的原因"/>
      <definition value="如果小節為空，則說明清單為空的原因。一個空的小節通常有一些文字說明空的原因。"/>
      <comment
               value="當一個小節是空的，其空白的原因對於理解該小節非常重要。需要注意的是，這個代碼是用於當整個小節的內容都沒有被包括時，它並不適用於個別項目被省略的情形，若為個別項目被省略的情況，開發者可以考慮在該條目中添加文字說明或標記。"/>
      <requirements value="允許捕捉像是「不存在」或「未詢問」這樣的情況，這對於大多數清單來說可能很重要。"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.emptyReason"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="CodeableConcept"/>
        <profile
                 value="https://twcore.mohw.gov.tw/ig/twcore/StructureDefinition/CodeableConcept-tw"/>
      </type>
      <condition value="ele-1"/>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <binding>
        <extension
                   url="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/elementdefinition-bindingName">
          <valueString value="SectionEmptyReason"/>
        </extension>
        <strength value="preferred"/>
        <description
                     value="鼓勵使用所綁定值集中的代碼，但不強制一定要使用此值集，你也可使用其他值集的代碼或單純以文字表示。"/>
        <valueSet value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/list-empty-reason"/>
      </binding>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="n/a"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="v2"/>
        <map value="CE/CNE/CWE"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="CD"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="orim"/>
        <map value="fhir:CodeableConcept rdfs:subClassOf dt:CD"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-sof.section">
      <path value="Composition.section.section"/>
      <short value="嵌套的小節"/>
      <definition value="此小節中嵌套的小節"/>
      <comment value="嵌套小節主要是為了幫助讀者快速找到文件中的特定內容"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="*"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.section"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="*"/>

                        value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Composition#Composition.section"/>
      <condition value="cmp-1"/>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>

                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>

             value="./outboundRelationship[typeCode=&quot;COMP&quot; and isNormalActRelationship()]/target[moodCode=&quot;EVN&quot; and classCode=&quot;DOCSECT&quot; and isNormalAct]"/>

    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-caregiver">
      <path value="Composition.section"/>
      <sliceName value="questionnaire-caregiver"/>
      <short value="照顧者評估"/>
      <definition value="構成composition的各小節"/>
      <min value="1"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="*"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="BackboneElement"/>
      </type>
      <constraint>
        <key value="cmp-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human
               value="A section must contain at least one of text, entries, or sub-sections"/>
        <expression
                    value="text.exists() or entry.exists() or section.exists()"/>
        <xpath
               value="exists(f:text) or exists(f:entry) or exists(f:section)"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Composition"/>
      </constraint>
      <constraint>
        <key value="cmp-2"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="A section can only have an emptyReason if it is empty"/>
        <expression value="emptyReason.empty() or entry.empty()"/>
        <xpath value="not(exists(f:emptyReason) and exists(f:entry))"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Composition"/>
      </constraint>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <mustSupport value="true"/>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map
             value="./outboundRelationship[typeCode=&quot;COMP&quot; and isNormalActRelationship()]/target[moodCode=&quot;EVN&quot; and classCode=&quot;DOCSECT&quot; and isNormalAct]"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="cda"/>
        <map value=".component.structuredBody.component.section"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-caregiver.id">

    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-caregiver.extension">
      <path value="Composition.section.extension"/>
      <short value="Additional content defined by implementations"/>
      <definition
                  value="May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension."/>
      <comment
               value="There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.  The use of extensions is what allows the FHIR specification to retain a core level of simplicity for everyone."/>
      <alias value="extensions"/>
      <alias value="user content"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="*"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Element.extension"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="*"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="Extension"/>
      </type>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ext-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="Must have either extensions or value[x], not both"/>
        <expression value="extension.exists() != value.exists()"/>
        <xpath
               value="exists(f:extension)!=exists(f:*[starts-with(local-name(.), &quot;value&quot;)])"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Extension"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="n/a"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element
             id="Composition.section:questionnaire-caregiver.modifierExtension">
      <path value="Composition.section.modifierExtension"/>
      <short value="Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized"/>
      <definition
                  value="May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element and that modifies the understanding of the element in which it is contained and/or the understanding of the containing element's descendants. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions.

Modifier extensions SHALL NOT change the meaning of any elements on Resource or DomainResource (including cannot change the meaning of modifierExtension itself)."/>
      <comment
               value="There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.  The use of extensions is what allows the FHIR specification to retain a core level of simplicity for everyone."/>
      <requirements
                    value="Modifier extensions allow for extensions that *cannot* be safely ignored to be clearly distinguished from the vast majority of extensions which can be safely ignored.  This promotes interoperability by eliminating the need for implementers to prohibit the presence of extensions. For further information, see the [definition of modifier extensions](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extensibility.html#modifierExtension)."/>
      <alias value="extensions"/>
      <alias value="user content"/>
      <alias value="modifiers"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="*"/>
      <base>
        <path value="BackboneElement.modifierExtension"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="*"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="Extension"/>
      </type>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ext-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="Must have either extensions or value[x], not both"/>
        <expression value="extension.exists() != value.exists()"/>
        <xpath
               value="exists(f:extension)!=exists(f:*[starts-with(local-name(.), &quot;value&quot;)])"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Extension"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="true"/>
      <isModifierReason
                        value="Modifier extensions are expected to modify the meaning or interpretation of the element that contains them"/>
      <isSummary value="true"/>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="N/A"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-caregiver.title">
      <path value="Composition.section.title"/>
      <short value="小節標籤(例如：目錄ToC)"/>
      <definition value="此特定小節的標籤。這將是文件呈現內容的一部分，通常用於建立目錄。"/>
      <comment
               value="標題為人類讀者指明小節。標題必須與作為 section.content 參照目標的resource的敘述一致。通常章節 **建議應該(SHOULD)** 有標題，但在某些文件中，這可能是不必要的或不適當的。通常情況下，當一個小節有其自己足夠區分的標題的子小節，或只有單一小節的文件時，就會這樣。大多數IG會要求小節標題是必填的資料項目。"/>
      <requirements value="不同類型的文件常常會有標準化的小節標題，這些標題為人們提供如何組織文件的指引。"/>
      <alias value="header"/>
      <alias value="label"/>
      <alias value="caption"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.title"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="string"/>
      </type>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="./title"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="cda"/>
        <map value=".title"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-caregiver.code">
      <path value="Composition.section.code"/>
      <short value="小節分類(建議)"/>
      <definition value="一個用於指明小節中所含內容種類的代碼，這個代碼必須與小節的標題相一致。"/>
      <comment
               value="Not all terminology uses fit this general pattern. In some cases, models should not use CodeableConcept and use Coding directly and provide their own structure for managing text, codings, translations and the relationship between elements and pre- and post-coordination."/>
      <requirements value="提供給文件中主題的標籤是標準化的，並且可以被電腦程式識別和處理。"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.code"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="CodeableConcept"/>
        <profile
                 value="https://twcore.mohw.gov.tw/ig/twcore/StructureDefinition/CodeableConcept-tw"/>
      </type>
      <condition value="ele-1"/>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <mustSupport value="true"/>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <binding>
        <strength value="extensible"/>
        <description value="應填入所綁定值集中適合的代碼，確定無適合的代碼才可以使用其他值集的代碼來表示。"/>
        <valueSet value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/doc-section-codes"/>
      </binding>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="n/a"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="v2"/>
        <map value="CE/CNE/CWE"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="CD"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="orim"/>
        <map value="fhir:CodeableConcept rdfs:subClassOf dt:CD"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-caregiver.author">
      <path value="Composition.section.author"/>
      <short value="誰和/或什麼人撰寫了該小節"/>
      <definition value="指明誰對小節中的資訊負責，而不一定是誰輸入了它。"/>
      <requirements value="指明誰對內容負責"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="*"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.author"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="*"/>
      </base>

        <code value="Reference"/>
        <targetProfile
                       value="https://twcore.mohw.gov.tw/ig/twcore/StructureDefinition/Practitioner-twcore"/>
        <targetProfile
                       value="https://twcore.mohw.gov.tw/ig/twcore/StructureDefinition/PractitionerRole-twcore"/>
        <targetProfile
                       value="https://twcore.mohw.gov.tw/ig/twcore/StructureDefinition/Organization-twcore"/>
        <targetProfile
                       value="https://twcore.mohw.gov.tw/ig/twcore/StructureDefinition/Patient-twcore"/>
        <targetProfile
                       value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Device"/>
        <targetProfile
                       value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RelatedPerson"/>
      </type>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>

        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>

      <isSummary value="false"/>

      </mapping>

             value=".participation[typeCode=&quot;AUT&quot;].role[classCode=&quot;ASSIGNED&quot;]"/>

        <map value=".author.assignedAuthor"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-caregiver.focus">
      <path value="Composition.section.focus"/>
      <short value="當小節與composition描述的對象無關時，此小節是關於誰/什麼。"/>
      <definition
                  value="當小節的實際焦點不是composition描述的對象，而是代表與對象相關的某事物或某人時，例如：（對於病人對象）配偶、父母、胎兒或捐贈者。如果沒有指定焦點，則假定焦點為父小節的焦點，或者對於Composition本身中的小節，為Composition的對象。具有焦點的小節只 **必須（SHALL）** 包含對象（病人、對象、焦點等）與小節焦點相匹配的resources，或者是沒有對象的resources（少數resources）。"/>
      <comment
               value="通常，文件中的小節是關於該文件的描述對象，無論是病人、一群病人、位置、設備或其他。對於某些種類的文件，有些小節實際上包含有關的實體資料。典型的例子包括新生兒出院病摘中關於母親的小節，或者家族病史文件中關於每個家庭成員的小節，當然還有很多其他例子。"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.focus"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="Reference"/>
        <targetProfile
                       value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Resource"/>
      </type>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="cda"/>
        <map
             value=".subject? (CDA did not differentiate between subject and focus)"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-caregiver.text">
      <path value="Composition.section.text"/>
      <short value="將文件中特定小節的內容簡化成容易理解的文字形式，便於人類閱讀和解釋。"/>
      <definition
                  value="一個供人閱讀的敘述，包含小節的核實內容，用以展現resource的內容供人類閱讀。這段敘述不需要涵蓋所有結構化的資料，但必須包含足夠的細節，確保僅透過閱讀這段敘述的人能夠在臨床上獲得安全且準確的資訊。"/>
      <comment value="文件Profile可能會定義應在敘述中呈現哪些內容，以確保臨床安全。"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.text"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="Narrative"/>
      </type>
      <condition value="cmp-1"/>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <mustSupport value="true"/>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value=".text"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="cda"/>
        <map value=".text"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-caregiver.mode">
      <path value="Composition.section.mode"/>
      <short value="適用於此小節的處理模式"/>
      <definition
                  value="條目清單是如何準備的 - 它是一個適合持續維護的工作清單，還是代表從另一個來源截取的項目清單的快照，或者是一個準備好的清單，在該清單中，項目可能被標記為已添加、修改或刪除。"/>
      <comment
               value="這個資料項目被標記為修飾用，是因為不應將變更清單(a change list)誤解為完整清單(a complete list)。"/>
      <requirements value="小節有多種使用方式，因此必須清楚地了解如何安全地使用其中的條目。"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.mode"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="code"/>
      </type>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <binding>
        <extension
                   url="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/elementdefinition-bindingName">
          <valueString value="SectionMode"/>
        </extension>
        <strength value="required"/>
        <description value="應填入所綁定值集中的其中一個代碼。"/>
        <valueSet value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/list-mode|4.0.1"/>
      </binding>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="w5"/>
        <map value="FiveWs.class"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map
             value=".outBoundRelationship[typeCode=COMP].target[classCode=OBS&quot;].value"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="cda"/>
        <map value="n/a"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-caregiver.orderedBy">
      <path value="Composition.section.orderedBy"/>
      <short value="小節條目的順序"/>
      <definition value="指定應用於小節條目的項目順序"/>
      <comment
               value="應用程式 **建議應該(SHOULD)** 按照給定的順序來顯示有序清單，但也可以允許用戶按照他們自己的偏好進行重新排序。如果沒有明確指定順序，則該順序是不確定的，雖然清單可能仍有某種排列順序。"/>
      <requirements value="這對於展示和呈現是重要的，清單可能會進行排序，以便將重要的資訊放在前面，或將相關的條目分組。"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.orderedBy"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="CodeableConcept"/>
        <profile
                 value="https://twcore.mohw.gov.tw/ig/twcore/StructureDefinition/CodeableConcept-tw"/>
      </type>
      <condition value="ele-1"/>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <binding>
        <extension
                   url="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/elementdefinition-bindingName">
          <valueString value="SectionEntryOrder"/>
        </extension>
        <strength value="preferred"/>
        <description
                     value="鼓勵使用所綁定值集中的代碼，但不強制一定要使用此值集，你也可使用其他值集的代碼或單純以文字表示。"/>
        <valueSet value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/list-order"/>
      </binding>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="n/a"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>

        <map value="CE/CNE/CWE"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="CD"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="orim"/>
        <map value="fhir:CodeableConcept rdfs:subClassOf dt:CD"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-caregiver.entry">

    <element id="Composition.section:questionnaire-caregiver.emptyReason">
      <path value="Composition.section.emptyReason"/>
      <short value="為什麼此小節是空的原因"/>
      <definition value="如果小節為空，則說明清單為空的原因。一個空的小節通常有一些文字說明空的原因。"/>
      <comment
               value="當一個小節是空的，其空白的原因對於理解該小節非常重要。需要注意的是，這個代碼是用於當整個小節的內容都沒有被包括時，它並不適用於個別項目被省略的情形，若為個別項目被省略的情況，開發者可以考慮在該條目中添加文字說明或標記。"/>
      <requirements value="允許捕捉像是「不存在」或「未詢問」這樣的情況，這對於大多數清單來說可能很重要。"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.emptyReason"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="CodeableConcept"/>
        <profile
                 value="https://twcore.mohw.gov.tw/ig/twcore/StructureDefinition/CodeableConcept-tw"/>
      </type>
      <condition value="ele-1"/>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <binding>
        <extension
                   url="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/elementdefinition-bindingName">
          <valueString value="SectionEmptyReason"/>
        </extension>
        <strength value="preferred"/>
        <description
                     value="鼓勵使用所綁定值集中的代碼，但不強制一定要使用此值集，你也可使用其他值集的代碼或單純以文字表示。"/>
        <valueSet value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/list-empty-reason"/>
      </binding>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="n/a"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="v2"/>
        <map value="CE/CNE/CWE"/>
      </mapping>

        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="CD"/>

    <element id="Composition.section:encounter">
      <path value="Composition.section"/>
      <sliceName value="encounter"/>
      <short value="出入院情形"/>
      <definition value="構成composition的各小節"/>
      <min value="1"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="*"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="BackboneElement"/>
      </type>
      <constraint>
        <key value="cmp-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human
               value="A section must contain at least one of text, entries, or sub-sections"/>
        <expression
                    value="text.exists() or entry.exists() or section.exists()"/>
        <xpath
               value="exists(f:text) or exists(f:entry) or exists(f:section)"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Composition"/>
      </constraint>
      <constraint>
        <key value="cmp-2"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="A section can only have an emptyReason if it is empty"/>
        <expression value="emptyReason.empty() or entry.empty()"/>
        <xpath value="not(exists(f:emptyReason) and exists(f:entry))"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Composition"/>
      </constraint>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <mustSupport value="true"/>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map
             value="./outboundRelationship[typeCode=&quot;COMP&quot; and isNormalActRelationship()]/target[moodCode=&quot;EVN&quot; and classCode=&quot;DOCSECT&quot; and isNormalAct]"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="cda"/>
        <map value=".component.structuredBody.component.section"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:encounter.id">
      <path value="Composition.section.id"/>
      <representation value="xmlAttr"/>
      <short value="Unique id for inter-element referencing"/>
      <definition
                  value="Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces."/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>

    <element id="Composition.section:encounter.extension">
      <path value="Composition.section.extension"/>
      <short value="Additional content defined by implementations"/>
      <definition
                  value="May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension."/>
      <comment
               value="There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.  The use of extensions is what allows the FHIR specification to retain a core level of simplicity for everyone."/>
      <alias value="extensions"/>
      <alias value="user content"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="*"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Element.extension"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="*"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="Extension"/>
      </type>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ext-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="Must have either extensions or value[x], not both"/>
        <expression value="extension.exists() != value.exists()"/>
        <xpath
               value="exists(f:extension)!=exists(f:*[starts-with(local-name(.), &quot;value&quot;)])"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Extension"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="n/a"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:encounter.modifierExtension">
      <path value="Composition.section.modifierExtension"/>
      <short value="Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized"/>
      <definition
                  value="May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element and that modifies the understanding of the element in which it is contained and/or the understanding of the containing element's descendants. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions.

Modifier extensions SHALL NOT change the meaning of any elements on Resource or DomainResource (including cannot change the meaning of modifierExtension itself)."/>
      <comment
               value="There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.  The use of extensions is what allows the FHIR specification to retain a core level of simplicity for everyone."/>
      <requirements
                    value="Modifier extensions allow for extensions that *cannot* be safely ignored to be clearly distinguished from the vast majority of extensions which can be safely ignored.  This promotes interoperability by eliminating the need for implementers to prohibit the presence of extensions. For further information, see the [definition of modifier extensions](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extensibility.html#modifierExtension)."/>
      <alias value="extensions"/>
      <alias value="user content"/>
      <alias value="modifiers"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="*"/>
      <base>
        <path value="BackboneElement.modifierExtension"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="*"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="Extension"/>
      </type>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ext-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="Must have either extensions or value[x], not both"/>
        <expression value="extension.exists() != value.exists()"/>
        <xpath
               value="exists(f:extension)!=exists(f:*[starts-with(local-name(.), &quot;value&quot;)])"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Extension"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="true"/>
      <isModifierReason
                        value="Modifier extensions are expected to modify the meaning or interpretation of the element that contains them"/>
      <isSummary value="true"/>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="N/A"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:encounter.title">
      <path value="Composition.section.title"/>
      <short value="小節標籤(例如：目錄ToC)"/>
      <definition value="此特定小節的標籤。這將是文件呈現內容的一部分，通常用於建立目錄。"/>
      <comment
               value="標題為人類讀者指明小節。標題必須與作為 section.content 參照目標的resource的敘述一致。通常章節 **建議應該(SHOULD)** 有標題，但在某些文件中，這可能是不必要的或不適當的。通常情況下，當一個小節有其自己足夠區分的標題的子小節，或只有單一小節的文件時，就會這樣。大多數IG會要求小節標題是必填的資料項目。"/>
      <requirements value="不同類型的文件常常會有標準化的小節標題，這些標題為人們提供如何組織文件的指引。"/>
      <alias value="header"/>
      <alias value="label"/>
      <alias value="caption"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.title"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="string"/>
      </type>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="./title"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="cda"/>
        <map value=".title"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:encounter.code">
      <path value="Composition.section.code"/>
      <short value="小節分類(建議)"/>
      <definition value="一個用於指明小節中所含內容種類的代碼，這個代碼必須與小節的標題相一致。"/>
      <comment
               value="Not all terminology uses fit this general pattern. In some cases, models should not use CodeableConcept and use Coding directly and provide their own structure for managing text, codings, translations and the relationship between elements and pre- and post-coordination."/>
      <requirements value="提供給文件中主題的標籤是標準化的，並且可以被電腦程式識別和處理。"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.code"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="CodeableConcept"/>
        <profile
                 value="https://twcore.mohw.gov.tw/ig/twcore/StructureDefinition/CodeableConcept-tw"/>
      </type>
      <condition value="ele-1"/>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <mustSupport value="true"/>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <binding>
        <strength value="extensible"/>
        <description value="應填入所綁定值集中適合的代碼，確定無適合的代碼才可以使用其他值集的代碼來表示。"/>
        <valueSet value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/doc-section-codes"/>
      </binding>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="n/a"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="v2"/>
        <map value="CE/CNE/CWE"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="CD"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="orim"/>
        <map value="fhir:CodeableConcept rdfs:subClassOf dt:CD"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:encounter.author">
      <path value="Composition.section.author"/>
      <short value="誰和/或什麼人撰寫了該小節"/>
      <definition value="指明誰對小節中的資訊負責，而不一定是誰輸入了它。"/>
      <requirements value="指明誰對內容負責"/>
      <min value="0"/>

        <targetProfile
                       value="https://twcore.mohw.gov.tw/ig/twcore/StructureDefinition/Organization-twcore"/>

                       value="https://twcore.mohw.gov.tw/ig/twcore/StructureDefinition/Patient-twcore"/>
        <targetProfile
                       value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Device"/>

                       value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RelatedPerson"/>
      </type>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>

        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="w5"/>
        <map value="FiveWs.author"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map
             value=".participation[typeCode=&quot;AUT&quot;].role[classCode=&quot;ASSIGNED&quot;]"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="cda"/>
        <map value=".author.assignedAuthor"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:encounter.focus">
      <path value="Composition.section.focus"/>
      <short value="當小節與composition描述的對象無關時，此小節是關於誰/什麼。"/>
      <definition
                  value="當小節的實際焦點不是composition描述的對象，而是代表與對象相關的某事物或某人時，例如：（對於病人對象）配偶、父母、胎兒或捐贈者。如果沒有指定焦點，則假定焦點為父小節的焦點，或者對於Composition本身中的小節，為Composition的對象。具有焦點的小節只 **必須（SHALL）** 包含對象（病人、對象、焦點等）與小節焦點相匹配的resources，或者是沒有對象的resources（少數resources）。"/>
      <comment
               value="通常，文件中的小節是關於該文件的描述對象，無論是病人、一群病人、位置、設備或其他。對於某些種類的文件，有些小節實際上包含有關的實體資料。典型的例子包括新生兒出院病摘中關於母親的小節，或者家族病史文件中關於每個家庭成員的小節，當然還有很多其他例子。"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.focus"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="Reference"/>
        <targetProfile
                       value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Resource"/>
      </type>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="cda"/>
        <map
             value=".subject? (CDA did not differentiate between subject and focus)"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:encounter.text">
      <path value="Composition.section.text"/>
      <short value="將文件中特定小節的內容簡化成容易理解的文字形式，便於人類閱讀和解釋。"/>
      <definition
                  value="一個供人閱讀的敘述，包含小節的核實內容，用以展現resource的內容供人類閱讀。這段敘述不需要涵蓋所有結構化的資料，但必須包含足夠的細節，確保僅透過閱讀這段敘述的人能夠在臨床上獲得安全且準確的資訊。"/>
      <comment value="文件Profile可能會定義應在敘述中呈現哪些內容，以確保臨床安全。"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.text"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="Narrative"/>
      </type>
      <condition value="cmp-1"/>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <mustSupport value="true"/>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value=".text"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="cda"/>
        <map value=".text"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:encounter.mode">
      <path value="Composition.section.mode"/>
      <short value="適用於此小節的處理模式"/>
      <definition
                  value="條目清單是如何準備的 - 它是一個適合持續維護的工作清單，還是代表從另一個來源截取的項目清單的快照，或者是一個準備好的清單，在該清單中，項目可能被標記為已添加、修改或刪除。"/>
      <comment
               value="這個資料項目被標記為修飾用，是因為不應將變更清單(a change list)誤解為完整清單(a complete list)。"/>
      <requirements value="小節有多種使用方式，因此必須清楚地了解如何安全地使用其中的條目。"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.mode"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="code"/>
      </type>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <isSummary value="false"/>
      <binding>
        <extension
                   url="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/elementdefinition-bindingName">
          <valueString value="SectionMode"/>
        </extension>
        <strength value="required"/>
        <description value="應填入所綁定值集中的其中一個代碼。"/>
        <valueSet value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/list-mode|4.0.1"/>
      </binding>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="w5"/>
        <map value="FiveWs.class"/>
      </mapping>

             value=".outBoundRelationship[typeCode=COMP].target[classCode=OBS&quot;].value"/>
      </mapping>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="cda"/>
        <map value="n/a"/>
      </mapping>
    </element>
    <element id="Composition.section:encounter.orderedBy">
      <path value="Composition.section.orderedBy"/>
      <short value="小節條目的順序"/>
      <definition value="指定應用於小節條目的項目順序"/>
      <comment
               value="應用程式 **建議應該(SHOULD)** 按照給定的順序來顯示有序清單，但也可以允許用戶按照他們自己的偏好進行重新排序。如果沒有明確指定順序，則該順序是不確定的，雖然清單可能仍有某種排列順序。"/>
      <requirements value="這對於展示和呈現是重要的，清單可能會進行排序，以便將重要的資訊放在前面，或將相關的條目分組。"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>

        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>

        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>

    <element id="Composition.section:encounter.emptyReason">
      <path value="Composition.section.emptyReason"/>
      <short value="為什麼此小節是空的原因"/>
      <definition value="如果小節為空，則說明清單為空的原因。一個空的小節通常有一些文字說明空的原因。"/>
      <comment
               value="當一個小節是空的，其空白的原因對於理解該小節非常重要。需要注意的是，這個代碼是用於當整個小節的內容都沒有被包括時，它並不適用於個別項目被省略的情形，若為個別項目被省略的情況，開發者可以考慮在該條目中添加文字說明或標記。"/>
      <requirements value="允許捕捉像是「不存在」或「未詢問」這樣的情況，這對於大多數清單來說可能很重要。"/>
      <min value="0"/>
      <max value="1"/>
      <base>
        <path value="Composition.section.emptyReason"/>
        <min value="0"/>
        <max value="1"/>
      </base>
      <type>
        <code value="CodeableConcept"/>
        <profile
                 value="https://twcore.mohw.gov.tw/ig/twcore/StructureDefinition/CodeableConcept-tw"/>
      </type>
      <condition value="ele-1"/>
      <constraint>
        <key value="ele-1"/>
        <severity value="error"/>
        <human value="All FHIR elements must have a @value or children"/>
        <expression
                    value="hasValue() or (children().count() &gt; id.count())"/>
        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
      </constraint>
      <isModifier value="false"/>
      <binding>
        <extension
                   url="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/elementdefinition-bindingName">
          <valueString value="SectionEmptyReason"/>
        </extension>
        <strength value="preferred"/>
        <description
                     value="鼓勵使用所綁定值集中的代碼，但不強制一定要使用此值集，你也可使用其他值集的代碼或單純以文字表示。"/>
        <valueSet value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/list-empty-reason"/>
      </binding>
      <mapping>
        <identity value="rim"/>
        <map value="n/a"/>
      </mapping>

        <xpath value="@value|f:*|h:div"/>
        <source value="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Element"/>
